prompt: Text your group chat about what happened at lunch today using Gen-Alpha slang and emojis. Keep it short (50-100 words max).
response: "Yaaas, guys! 🤩 I'm low-key still vibin' from lunch today 😍. So, I was hangry af and then I saw the food truck 🚀. They had these lit grilled cheese sandwiches 🧀🔥.
